author: Ricardo Espinoza
text: I know it's still too early to call, but I think The @Tribeca Games Spotlight has to be my favorite showcase this year. Such a delightful slate of projects that are pushing the boundaries of the industry. Thank you to all the teams involved that helped put on a great show ♥️ https://t.co/VR9RISJ9fL

author: Ricardo Espinoza
text: Coming out of the Far Cry 6 showcase I'm more excited than ever to jump into Yara. The world looks stunning, the story seems captivating, and Chorizo the weiner dog is my new best friend 🥺 Mark your calendars for Oct 7th... This looks like a day one for me! 🔥🔥🔥 https://t.co/wYwVMmJz1m
